description: '''Roger Sanchez''' (born June 1, 1967) is an American [[house music|house]] [[disc jockey|DJ]], [[remix|remixer]] and [[record producer|producer]]. He won a [[Grammy Award for Best Remixed Recording, Non-Classical|Grammy Award]] for his remix of "[[Hella Good]]" by [[No Doubt]] in 2003, and is best known for his song "[[Another Chance (Roger Sanchez song)|Another Chance]]", which was an international hit in 2001. He is a four time [[DJ Awards]] winner for "Best House DJ" in 1999, 2002, 2004 and 2007 and has received twelve nominations in total. He won the first [[IDMA|International Dance Music Award]] for Best Podcast in 2007 and has received 8 IDMA nominations for Best American DJ (2003â€“2010).
